name: Bospop

config_properties.name: Bospop
config_properties.description: A classic rock and pop festival in Weert, Netherlands, held annually since 1981.

ai_profile:
**Bospop 2026: A Celebration of Rock and Beyond**  
Bospop 2026 promises a dynamic lineup of 39 artists, showcasing a strong foundation in rock with 15 acts representing the genre, complemented by a rich variety of subgenres including blues rock, alternative rock, and indie rock. With additional flavors of soul, symphonic metal, and even comedy rock, the festival embraces a broad spectrum of musical styles, ensuring there’s something for every fan. Notably, the event also features two electronic DJs, adding a modern twist to its classic roots.

The festival highlights international diversity, with artists hailing from 10 different countries. The USA leads the charge with 10 acts, followed by the Netherlands and the UK, each contributing six. Belgium, Canada, and Australia also make a strong showing, alongside artists from Denmark, Germany, Sweden, and more. This global representation underscores Bospop’s commitment to bringing together talent from around the world.

While the majority of performers are male, the lineup includes five female-fronted acts and one mixed-gender group, reflecting a step toward greater gender diversity. Additionally, four acts feature artists of color, with seven more whose backgrounds are not specified. With an impressive average rating of 8.16 from 82.1% of rated acts, Bospop 2026 is set to deliver a high-quality experience for attendees, blending classic appeal with fresh, diverse sounds.
